abstract.t: This memo describes a set of extensions for supporting generic policy based admission control in RSVP. [Note 1] These extensions include the standard format of POLICY_DATA objects, a generic RSVP/Policy-Control interface, and a description of RSVP's handling of policy events. This document does not advocate particular policy control mechanisms; however, a Router/Server Policy Protocol description for these extensions can be found in [LPM].
